Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CGridColumnConfigAbstract interface for persisting column configuration
CGridColumnConfigDefaultAbstract interface for persisting column configuration, that can use an in-memory default-configuration
CGridColumnConfigProfilesAbstract interface for persisting column configuration, that can switch between different column configuration profiles
CGridColumnConfigWinAppCan persist the column configuration using CWinApp::WriteProfile()
CGridColumnEditorCGridColumnEditor specifies the interface for the column editor, which the CGridListCtrlEx is compatible with
CGridColumnEditorProfileImplementation of the CGridColumnEditor interface, that supports persistance of the column state
CGridColumnTraitCGridColumnTrait specifies the methods needed for custom cell handling
CGridColumnTraitComboCGridColumnTraitCombo implements a CComboBox as cell-editor
CGridColumnTraitDateTimeCGridColumnTraitDateTime implements a CDateTimeCtrl as cell-editor
CGridColumnTraitEditCGridColumnTraitEdit implements a CEdit as cell-editor
CGridColumnTraitTextCGridColumnTraitText provides customization of cell text and background
CGridColumnTraitVisitorCGridColumnTraitVisitor enables the use of the visitor-pattern to add extra behavior to the CGridColumnTrait classes
CGridEditorComboBoxCGridEditorComboBox (For internal use)
CGridEditorComboBoxEditCGridEditorComboBoxEdit (For internal use)
CGridEditorDateTimeCtrlCGridEditorDateTimeCtrl (For internal use)
CGridEditorTextCGridEditorText (For internal use)
CGridListCtrlExCGridListCtrlEx extends the CListCtrl with several features
CGridListCtrlGroupsCGridListCtrlGroups extends the CGridListCtrlEx with grouping
CGridRowTraitCGridRowTrait specifies an interface for handling custom drawing at row-level
CGridRowTraitTextCGridRowTraitText provides customization text and background at row-level
CGridRowTraitVisitorCGridRowTraitVisitor enables the use of the visitor-pattern to add extra behavior to the CGridRowTrait classes
CGridRowTraitXPCGridRowTraitXP fixes drawing of rows when the application is using classic- or XP-style
